channel.title: NPC Yelling Error

item.title: NPC Yelling Error
item.dc:creator: @kaoticvela74 kaoticvela74
item.description:
@kaoticvela74 wrote:

[code]NPCHandler.java:1280: class, interface, or enum expected
if (npcs[i].npcType == 832) {
^
NPCHandler.java:1283: class, interface, or enum expected
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
^
NPCHandler.java:1284: class, interface, or enum expected
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Portal”;
^
NPCHandler.java:1285: class, interface, or enum expected
}
^
NPCHandler.java:1294: class, interface, or enum expected
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
^
NPCHandler.java:1295: class, interface, or enum expected
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Portal2”;
^
code]

I get that error… No idea why, ive done this before, with success, and i cant seem to figure out whats wrong, any help?[/code]

Read full topic
